getCollaborativeStatistics.sql4: (CASE WHEN b.total IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.total END) AS "数量", (CASE WHEN c.total IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.total END) AS "平均数", (CASE WHEN b.over_due IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.over_due END) AS "超期数", (CASE WHEN CAST(ROUND(cast(b.over_due as numeric )/cast(b.total AS NUMERIC)*100,2) AS VARCHAR) IS NULL THEN '0.00%' ELSE CONCAT(CAST(ROUND(cast(b.over_due as numeric )/cast(b.total AS NUMERIC)*100,2) AS VARCHAR),'%') END) AS "超期百分比", a.member_id as member_id,:startTime as start_time,:endTime as end_time FROM ( (SELECT o.ID AS member_id, o.NAME AS NAME, o.ORG_DEPARTMENT_ID AS dep_id FROM org_member o WHERE o.ID IN(:users)) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT ca.MEMBER_ID AS member_id, COUNT(ca.MEMBER_ID) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN :timeStr2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS over_due FROM ctp_affair ca WHERE ca.member_id IN(:users) and ca.is_delete = 0 AND ca.app in( :apptype) AND (ca.state = :state
getCollaborativeStatistics.sql5: GROUP BY ca.member_id) b ON a.member_id=b.member_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT middle.DEPARTMENT_ID as dep_id,SUM(middle.AVG_NUMBER) as total FROM rpt_collaborative middle WHERE middle.APP_TYPE in( :apptype) AND middle.STATUS = :status AND (:time=3 OR (:time<>3 AND :avgStart <= to_char(middle.query_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_char(middle.query_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') < :avgEnd)) GROUP BY middle.DEPARTMENT_ID) c ON a.dep_id=c.dep_id ) order by a.name
getCollaborativeStatistics.sql6: (CASE WHEN b.total IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.total END) AS "数量", (CASE WHEN d.total IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE d.total END) AS "平均数", (CASE WHEN b.over_due IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.over_due END) AS "超期数", (CASE WHEN CAST(ROUND(cast(b.over_due as numeric )/cast(b.total AS NUMERIC)*100,2) AS VARCHAR) IS NULL THEN '0.00%' ELSE CONCAT(CAST(ROUND(cast(b.over_due as numeric )/cast(b.total AS NUMERIC)*100,2) AS VARCHAR),'%') END) AS "超期百分比", a.member_id as member_id,:startTime as start_time,:endTime as end_time FROM ( (SELECT o.ID AS member_id, o.NAME AS NAME, o.ORG_DEPARTMENT_ID AS dep_id FROM org_member o WHERE o.ID IN(:users)) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT doc.create_user_id AS member_id, COUNT(*) AS total, SUM(CASE WHEN affair.is_process_over_time=1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS over_due FROM doc_resources doc left JOIN CTP_AFFAIR affair on affair.ID=doc.SOURCE_ID and doc.mime_type_id=1 WHERE doc.MIME_TYPE_ID=:mime_type_id AND doc.CREATE_USER_ID IN(:users) AND (CASE WHEN 3<>:time THEN to_char(doc.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')<:endTime AND to_char(doc.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:startTime ELSE 1=1 END) GROUP BY doc.create_user_id) b ON a.member_id=b.member_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT middle.DEPARTMENT_ID as dep_id,SUM(middle.AVG_NUMBER) as total FROM rpt_collaborative middle WHERE middle.APP_TYPE in( :apptype) AND middle.STATUS = 16 AND (:time=3 OR (:time<>3 AND :avgStart <= to_char(middle.query_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_char(middle.query_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') < :avgEnd)) GROUP BY middle.DEPARTMENT_ID) d ON a.dep_id=d.dep_id) order by a.name

generateStatus.sql6: or ca.state=3 and EXISTS (select * from doc_resources d where d.id=ca.ARCHIVE_ID and to_char(d.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:start_time AND to_char(d.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')<:endTime)
generateStatus.sql16: AND ca.ARCHIVE_ID is null AND to_char(ca.RECEIVE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:start_time AND to_char(ca.RECEIVE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')<:endTime)
generateStatus.sql29: or ca.state=3 and ca.ARCHIVE_ID is not null and EXISTS (select * from doc_resources d where d.id=ca.ARCHIVE_ID))

getPlanStatistics.sql1: SELECT a.name AS "管理范围", '计划' AS "类型",
getPlanStatistics.sql2: (CASE WHEN b.total IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.total END) AS "数量", (CASE WHEN c.dep_sum IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.dep_sum END) AS "平均数", '-' AS "超期数", '-' AS "超期百分比", a.member_id as member_id,:startTime as start_time,:endTime as end_time FROM ( (SELECT o.ID AS member_id, o.NAME AS NAME, o.ORG_DEPARTMENT_ID AS dep_id FROM org_member o WHERE o.ID IN(:users)) a LEFT JOIN
getPlanStatistics.sql3: ON a.member_id=b.member_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT middle.department_id AS dep_id, sum(middle.total) AS dep_sum FROM rpt_plan middle WHERE middle.status=:status AND (:time=3 OR (:time<>3 AND :avgStart <= to_char(middle.query_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_char(middle.query_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') < :avgEnd)) GROUP BY middle.DEPARTMENT_ID) c ON a.dep_id=c.dep_id ) order by a.name

generatePlanStatus.sql2: (SELECT p.create_user_id AS member_id, COUNT(p.create_user_id) AS total FROM plan_info p WHERE p.status <> 1 AND p.create_user_id IN(:users) AND (CASE WHEN 3<>:time THEN to_char(p.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= :startTime AND to_char(p.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') < :endTime ELSE TRUE END) GROUP BY p.create_user_id) b
generatePlanStatus.sql4: (SELECT pu.ref_user_id AS member_id, COUNT(pu.ref_user_id) AS total FROM plan_info p INNER JOIN plan_relevant_user pu ON p.id = pu.ref_plan_id WHERE p.status <> 1 AND pu.type<>'4' AND pu.ref_user_id IN(:users) AND (CASE WHEN 3<>:time THEN to_char(p.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= :startTime AND to_char(p.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') < :endTime ELSE TRUE END) GROUP BY pu.ref_user_id) b
generatePlanStatus.sql6: (SELECT a.CREATE_ID AS member_id, COUNT(DISTINCT a.MODULE_ID) AS total FROM ctp_comment_all a INNER JOIN plan_info p ON a.MODULE_ID=p.ID WHERE a.MODULE_TYPE=5 AND p.status <> 1 AND a.CREATE_ID IN(:users) AND a.pid=0 AND (CASE WHEN 3<>:time THEN to_char(a.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= :startTime AND to_char(a.create_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') < :endTime ELSE TRUE END) GROUP BY a.create_id) b
generatePlanStatus.sql8: (SELECT pu.ref_user_id AS member_id, COUNT(pu.ref_user_id ) AS total FROM plan_info p INNER JOIN plan_relevant_user pu ON p.id = pu.ref_plan_id WHERE p.status <> 1 AND pu.PROCESS<>1 and pu.type=1 AND pu.ref_user_id IN(:users) AND (CASE WHEN 3<>:time THEN to_char(p.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= :startTime AND to_char(p.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') < :endTime ELSE TRUE END) GROUP BY pu.ref_user_id) b

getMeetingStatistics.sql1: SELECT a.name AS "管理范围", '会议' AS "类型",
getMeetingStatistics.sql2: (CASE WHEN b.total IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.total END) AS "数量", (CASE WHEN c.dep_sum is null THEN 0 ELSE c.dep_sum END) AS "平均数", '-' AS "超期数", '-' AS "超期百分比", a.member_id as member_id,:startTime as start_time,:endTime as end_time FROM ( (SELECT o.ID AS member_id, o.NAME AS NAME, o.ORG_DEPARTMENT_ID AS dep_id FROM org_member o WHERE o.ID IN(:users)) a LEFT JOIN (
getMeetingStatistics.sql3: ) b ON a.member_id=b.member_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT middle.department_id AS dep_id, sum(middle.total) AS dep_sum FROM rpt_meeting middle WHERE middle.status=:status AND (:time=3 OR (:time<>3 AND :avgStart <= to_char(middle.query_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') AND to_char(middle.query_time,'yyyy-mm-dd') < :avgEnd)) GROUP BY middle.DEPARTMENT_ID) c ON a.dep_id=c.dep_id ) order by a.name

generateMeetingStatus.sql2: SELECT m.create_user AS member_id, COUNT(m.CREATE_USER) AS total FROM meeting m WHERE m.create_user IN (:users) AND m.state!=50 AND (CASE WHEN 3<>:time THEN ( CASE WHEN UPDATE_DATE IS NULL then (to_char(m.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:startTime AND to_char(m.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<:endTime) ELSE (to_char(m.UPDATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:startTime AND to_char(m.UPDATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<:endTime) END) ELSE TRUE END) AND m.STATE <> 0 AND m.room_state <>0 AND m.room_state<>2 GROUP BY m.CREATE_USER
generateMeetingStatus.sql4: SELECT m.member_id AS member_id, COUNT(m.member_id) total FROM ctp_affair AS m inner join meeting mt on mt.id=m.object_id WHERE m.APP = 6 and m.member_id IN (:users) AND m.SUB_APP = 5 AND m.STATE = 4 and mt.state in (30, -10,31) AND (CASE WHEN 3<>:time THEN (to_char(mt.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:startTime AND to_char(mt.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<:endTime) ELSE TRUE END) GROUP BY m.member_id
generateMeetingStatus.sql6: SELECT m.member_id AS member_id, COUNT(m.member_id) total FROM ctp_affair AS m inner join meeting mt on mt.id=m.object_id WHERE m.member_id IN (:users) AND m.APP = 6 AND m.sub_state!=34 AND m.SUB_APP = 5 AND (m.state = 3 AND m.SUB_STATE<>32) AND (CASE WHEN 3<>:time THEN ( (to_char(mt.BEGIN_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:startTime AND to_char(mt.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<=:endTime) OR (to_char(mt.BEGIN_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<=:startTime AND to_char(mt.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:startTime) OR (to_char(mt.BEGIN_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<:endTime AND to_char(mt.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:endTime) ) ELSE TRUE END) GROUP BY m.member_id
generateMeetingStatus.sql8: SELECT m.create_user AS member_id, COUNT(m.create_user) total FROM meeting m JOIN doc_resources doc ON (m.ID = doc.SOURCE_ID) WHERE m.create_user IN(:users) AND m.state = - 10 AND (CASE WHEN 3<>:time THEN (to_char(doc.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:startTime AND to_char(doc.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd')<:endTime) ELSE TRUE END) GROUP BY m.create_user
generateMeetingStatus.sql10: SELECT m.member_id AS member_id, COUNT(m.member_id) total FROM ctp_affair AS m INNER JOIN meeting mt on m.object_id=mt.id WHERE m.member_id IN (:users) AND m.APP = 6 AND m.SUB_APP = 5 AND (m.SUB_STATE = 11 OR m.SUB_STATE = 12) AND (CASE WHEN 3<>:time THEN (to_char(mt.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:startTime AND to_char(mt.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<:endTime) ELSE TRUE END) GROUP BY m.member_id
generateMeetingStatus.sql12: SELECT m.member_id AS member_id, COUNT(DISTINCT m.object_id) total FROM ctp_affair AS m INNER JOIN meeting mt on m.object_id=mt.id WHERE m.member_id IN (:users) AND m.APP = 6 AND m.SUB_APP = 5 AND (m.SUB_STATE = 31 OR m.SUB_STATE = 32 OR m.SUB_STATE = 33) AND (CASE WHEN 3<>:time THEN (to_char(mt.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')>=:startTime AND to_char(mt.END_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')<:endTime) ELSE TRUE END) GROUP BY m.member_id
